original_title: 1974: On the Road With The Beach Boys
overview: In 1974, The Beach Boys were at a low ebb. Their record sales bottoming out and desperate for income, The Beach Boys hit the road. Family friend and musician Billy Hinsche conned UCLA into letting him film a documentary about the tour on grainy, black-and-white videotape with a cumbersome Camcorder for his masterâ€™s thesis. The result is a fascinating time capsule that had been buried for 37 years.
title: 1974: On the Road With The Beach Boys
